title: Animelo Summer Live 2024 -Stargazer- 9/1
overview: The world's largest anime song event, "Animelo Summer Live 2024 - Stargazer -," is now available as Blu-ray, featuring live performances from each event day. DAY3: Features the performances from 9/1. Artists: The Idolmaster Shiny Colors / Shota Aoi / Asaka / Yuma Uchida / Kita Uji Quartet / ZAQ / Jashin Girls Ikenie SUMMER / Aina Suzuki / Minori Chihara / Nao Toyama / TRUE / Yoshino Nanjo / Kana Hanazawa / B Komachi / fripSide / Bravern (CV: Kenichi Suzumura) / Isami Aoi (CV: Ryota Suzuki) & Louis Smith (CV: Yohei Azakami) / ReoNa.
